schema.name: Healthyfied Cajun Shrimp

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your vegetables by rinsing the mixed vegetables under cold water to thaw.
Peel and devein the shrimp, ensuring they're ready for cooking.
In a bowl, mix the tomato ketchup, salt, ground black pepper, basil, and Cajun seasoning. Stir until well combined.
Add the shrimp to the bowl and toss them in the seasoning mix until they are evenly coated.
Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat. Once hot, add the seasoned shrimp. Cook for 2 minutes.
Add the mixed vegetables to the skillet with the shrimp. Cook for an additional 5-7 minutes until the shrimp are pink and fully cooked and the vegetables are tender.

schema.description: Dive into the essence of Louisiana with this Healthified Cajun Shrimp recipe. Perfect for anyone following a low-carb, low-sugar diet, yet not compromising on flavor. Rich in spices and packed with vibrant mixed vegetables, this dish brings a nutritious twist to your table while catering to a health-conscious lifestyle.
